{"title":"Jordan Hall: Sensemaking, or the superficial pitter-patter on the neocortex?","notes":["This episode is about sense-making... if you are not sick of that term yet, trust us, you soon will be.","To get things rolling, Matt and Chris launch the podcast with a pair of rants.
